vocabulary.example: The unforeseen consequences of the decision impacted the entire project.

vocabulary.definition: to handle or control in a skillful manner
vocabulary.example: The politician tried to manipulate public opinion through clever speeches.
His hubristic attitude often alienated his colleagues.

vocabulary.definition: causing someone to feel uncertain or uncomfortable
vocabulary.example: The strange smell in the room was quite off-putting.

vocabulary.definition: extreme in degree, strength, or size
vocabulary.example: Her intense focus and dedication helped her achieve her goals.

vocabulary.definition: speaking very softly using one's breath without using the vocal cords
vocabulary.example: She was whispering secrets to her friend in class.
